div.p: Parasitemia (number of parasites/100 fields). Parasites were recorded in blood smears of the house finch and the canyon towhee from the “Ixtlera” region in San Luis Potosi, Mexico. Black dots correspond to individuals yielding > 100 cells infected by haemosporidian parasites. t = 1.915, df = 55.408, P = 0.0606
